participant_1.background:
I'm not the healthiest person, but I do enjoy touring with Frank Ocean and I love ice cream.
I need the energy of the city to fuel my never-ending work.
my major is in business administration.
I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
I'm still looking for someone to share my life with.

participant_2.background:
I try to be mindful of my environmental impact, both at home and in my daily life.
My custom truck is my pride and joy.
i play bingo every wednesday with my husband.
I got to know my girlfriend better in the past year.
i am the oldest of 5 children.

content.text: Hello there! What are you up to tonight?
Hello! I am just finishing up some bingo cards. I play every Wednesday with my husband.
That sounds fun! I never really played bingo before. I am more of a fan of playing arcade games.
I do not play video games much, but I do like to go bowling with my friends.
Bowling sounds like a lot of fun. I am not very athletic, so I am not sure if I would be any good at it.
You do not have to be very athletic to bowl. It is just a matter of having fun and enjoying yourself.
I guess you are right. I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It is a lot of fun.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go camping, fishing, and hiking. I also like to watch movies and play board games.
Those all sound like great hobbies. I like to go camping and fishing too. I do not like to hike very much, but I do enjoy watching movies and playing board games.
It sounds like we have a lot in common. We should get together sometime and do something fun together.
I would love that! We can go camping or fishing, or we can just watch a movie and play some board games.
That sounds great! I will let you know when I am free.
Sounds good! I look forward to hearing from you
